title: High-contrast imaging for cancer therapy with protons

title_detail.value: High-contrast imaging for cancer therapy with protons

summary: Medical physicists have combined magnetic resonance imaging with a proton beam, thus demonstrating that in principle, this commonly used imaging method can indeed work with particle beam cancer treatments. This opens up new opportunities for targeted, healthy tissue-sparing cancer therapy.
